result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kenneth A. Pataska

records.addlTxt:
3:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Kenneth A. Pataska in court. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: DE is requesting an adjournment so he may save enough funds to retain an attorney. Discussion held regarding the restitution amount of $591 owed. State places the offer on the record. Court adjourns to allow DE to pay restitution in full.
Final pre-trial scheduled for February 6, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
FPT adj from 9/14 to 10/3; court unavailable on 9/14.  Voice mail message left for deft.  Email sent to DA's office
Final pre-trial on October 3, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Follow all previous Court Orders.

134PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.   Clerk JT  Minutes: The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.   Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:00 am. $1000  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). Follow all previous Court orders. mi
Adjourned initial appearance on July 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

01:25 PM  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  DE does not appear.  Clerk JT  Minutes:   The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm. rb
and witness list filed by the State
